title: the Sky Rider
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Zephyrus is the third sibling, wielding the elemental power of wind...

abilities.name: Gale Blades
abilities.details: Zephyrus starts with 3 Gale Blades. He gains additional blades based on his bonus attack speed.[n]His blades orbit him closely, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [as]attack speed[/]) to any enemy they pass through.[n]Each time he basic attacks, he uses 1 blade. His abilities can also use up all of his current blades.[n]When Zephyrus is out of blades, he is unable to [db]basic attack[/], use Razor Array or Cyclone Orbit until he regenerates more blades over time.

abilities.name: Razor Array
abilities.details: Zephyrus commands all his current blades to strike a target location in a rapid sequence. Each blade deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [as]attack speed[/]).[n]In Wind Dragon form, Zephyrus's blades stay on the enemies for a short duration and Razor Array can be recasted to return all blades from the enemies to Zephyrus, dealing additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [as]attack speed[/]).

abilities.name: Cyclone Orbit
abilities.details: Cyclone Orbit is only usable while Sky Soar is active. When casted, Zephyrus locks onto a target enemy hero and begins flying in a circle around them.[n]While orbiting, Zephyrus automatically launches his blades at the target. Each blade deals [ad]physical damage[/] on hit and immediately return to Zephyrus.[n]Zephyrus can choose either clockwise or anti-clockwise for the orbit direction. The firing rate of the blades scales directly with Zephyris's [as]attack speed[/].[n]In Wind Dragon form, the [bf]orbital speed[/] is increased based on his Zephyrus's movement speed.

abilities.name: Sky Soar
abilities.details: Zephyrus spreads his wings, gaining increased [ms]movement speed[/] and the ability to [ms]travel through terrain[/] for a duration.[n]In Wind Dragon form, Sky Soar is automatically activated and the flight duration remains [bf]permanent[/] until the transformation ends.

abilities.name: Air Breaker
abilities.details: Zephyrus transforms into the Wind Dragon, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [ms]movement speed[/] and [as]attack speed[/].[n]In addition, his attack speed cap is [bf]removed[/].[n]While in Wind Dragon form, his abilities are enhanced.
